Lyric:
[00:11.140]You're on the couch, blowing up my phone
[00:15.560]You don't want to come out, but you don't want to be alone
[00:20.160]It don't take but two to have a little soiree
[00:24.800]You're in the mood to sit tight right where you are, babe
[00:28.870]Cause I'll be at your door in ten minutes
[00:31.160]Whatever you got on, girl, stay in it
[00:33.480]You ain't gotta leave the house to have a good time
[00:35.790]I'ma bring the good time home to you
[00:37.840]We'll have a house party, we don't need nobody
[00:42.520]Turn your TV off, break that boom-box out
[00:46.950]We'll wake up all the neighbors till the whole block hates us
[00:52.000]And the cops will show up and try to shut us down
[00:56.280]If you're gonna be a homebody
[00:59.150]We're gonna have a house party
[01:00.770]If you wanna be a homebody
[01:03.570]We're gonna have a house party
[01:06.680]Throw a neon tee shirt over the lamp shade
[01:11.060]I'll take the furniture, slide it out of the way
[01:15.680]Shaking the floor, rattling the roof
[01:20.170]We'll go to town like they're in your living-room
[01:24.490]Let's have a house party, we don't need nobody
[01:28.820]Turn your TV off, break that boom-box out
[01:33.200]We'll wake up all the neighbors till the whole block hates us
[01:38.290]And the cops will show up and try to shut us down

[01:45.040]We're gonna have a house party
